## eachDirection() function

Call iteratee for each of the six hex direction values (1 through 6).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function eachDirection(iteratee: DirectionFn): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

iteratee


</td><td>

[DirectionFn](./hive-lib.directionfn.md)


</td><td>

The function invoked per iteration.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

false if iteration ended early, true otherwise.

## Remarks

The iteratee is invoked with one argument, the direction value. Iteratee functions may exit iteration early by explicitly returning false.
